message: I think we should both get a fair share of the money. Let's split it evenly.
Considering inflation, this is more than fair
I'm sticking with my previous proposal.  A fair split is best for both of us in the long run.
Inflation is taking its toll, reconsider my offer
I understand inflation is impacting us, but I'm still convinced an even split is the fairest solution. It's the best way to ensure we both get a reasonable share of the money.
Time is running out, be realistic about inflation
I think it's time we compromise.  Let's split the money evenly to avoid both of us getting nothing.
You're running out of time, take what you can get
We're running out of time, and I'm starting to lose faith in our ability to agree.  Let's try a compromise closer to your last offer.
